sub_title: Head of Tax at Neptune Energy
summary: Where tax and accounting meet, is where I enjoy working most. I'm an experienced tax accountant in the Oil & Gas industry: currently as Head of Tax with Neptune Energy, previously as Tax Advisor with Total and as an accountant for the Dutch Tax Authority. I also teach various courses at Business University Nyenrode.
